name: The Burmeister Group
description: Welcome to big ideas and bigger results. Unique brands that stand out among the clutter. And an unmatched enthusiasm for your business and helping it grow. At TBG, we’re not a big agency, nor do we have a desire to be. But our members have managed the departments of the biggest Atlanta advertising agencies. Our goal is to create success stories for clients who might be outspent by large competitors or who just don’t want to be a small fish in a big pond.
